name: Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce
author: Fahad Mahmood

sections.description:
• Author: Fahad Mahmood
  • Project URI: http://androidbubble.com/blog/wordpress/plugins/products-clearance-sale-for-woocommerce
  • Free Version: http://demo.androidbubble.com/products-clearance-sale-for-woocommerce
  • Premium Version: http://demo.ibulb.work/products-clearance-sale-for-woocommerce
  • License: GPL 3. See License below for copyright jots and titles.

Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce is a WooCommerce compatible plugin which enables you to automatically backup existing products and launch them on right time with updated price, description and images. It is certainly an attraction for the earlybird customers.

Important!

Visit my blog and suggest good features which you want to see in this plugin.

License

This WordPress Plugin is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version. This free software is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this software. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html.
sections.installation:
To use Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce, you will need:
* an installed and configured copy of [WordPress][] (version 3.0 or later).
* FTP, SFTP or shell access to your web host
sections.faq:
Upgrades

To upgrade an existing installation of Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce to the most recent release:

  1. Download the Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce installation package and extract the files on your computer.
  2. Upload the new PHP files to wp-content/plugins/products-clearance-sale-for-woocommerce, overwriting any existing Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce files that are there.
  3. Log in to your WordPress administrative interface immediately in order to see whether there are any further tasks that you need to perform to complete the upgrade.
  4. Enjoy your newer and hotter installation of Products Clearance Sale for WooCommerce

short_description: This is a great plugin to handle the clearance sales every season or new year.
